subtitleNullable: RSNA MICCAI's competition data in PNG format (from 128 GB to 5.2 GB)
descriptionNullable:
## RSNA MICCAI PNG
##### Transformed DICOM to PNG images

This dataset contains the "DICOM data" of the [RSNA-MICCAI Brain Tumor Radiogenomic Classification](https://www.kaggle.com/c/rsna-miccai-brain-tumor-radiogenomic-classification) challenge in PNG format. The original dataset has a size of 128 GB, whereas this one has a size of 5.2 GB.

For more context, you can read the [discussion topic here](https://www.kaggle.com/c/rsna-miccai-brain-tumor-radiogenomic-classification/discussion/253000).

**Notes**

 - Images sizes have been kept as the original ones.
 - To further reduce file size, all empty DICOM images files have not been included in the dataset, you can easily spoil them by looking at the images sequences (Image-X.png)
 - The structure of the dataset is not changed. I.e all .dcm files are now .png files.

**References:**

 U.Baid, et al., “The RSNA-ASNR-MICCAI BraTS 2021 Benchmark on Brain Tumor Segmentation and Radiogenomic Classification”, arXiv:2107.02314, 2021.

For more context, you can read the [discussion topic here](https://www.kaggle.com/c/rsna-miccai-brain-tumor-radiogenomic-classification/discussion/253000).

**Notes**

 - Images sizes have been kept as the original ones.
 - To further reduce file size, all empty DICOM images files have not been included in the dataset, you can easily spoil them by looking at the images sequences (Image-X.png)
